column6:
"Barracuda," Parts 1 (of 6) ,2006,3
Jigsaw, Ma Gnucci, the Russian -- Frank Castle's faced some fearsome foes in his day, but none as stone-cold rotten to the bone as The Barracuda. He's big, he's mean, and the last thing on earth you want is to see him smile.
32 PGS. /MAX - Explicit Content ...$2.99
